title: Drawing, "Plan and Elevation of Two Family House (Type No. 4)", ca. 1921
medium: Pen and ink, graphite on tracing paper
inscribed:
Top right in black ink: MAISON A 2 LOGEMENTS/ TYPE NO. 4
Bottom left in black ink: FACADE PRINCIPALE
Bottom right in black ink: PLAN DU REZ DE CHAUSSEE/ PLAN DE LA COUVERTURE
description: Plan for a two person mass-operational house, to be built according to constructional plans devised by Guimard for the post-Wold War I housing shortage. At the top of the design is a view of the house from the left moving right. Below, on the bottom left a design for the prinicpal facade. Pictured bottom right, a floor plan and design for the roof.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Plan and Elevation of Two Family House (Type No. 4)", ca. 1921.
ca. 1921. Pen and ink, graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Mme. Hector Guimard. 1950-66-65.
